title: Limitations of Project Management Maturity Models and Flexible Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Case analysis of maturity model applications in unstructured project environments to derive flexible management strategies.

learning_goals: In an unstructured project environment, learners can explain at least three limitations of project management maturity models.
Using a 4-node conceptual framework (Contextual Characteristics, Expert Knowledge, Stakeholder Engagement, Human Factors), learners can design project management strategies.
Based on case analysis results, learners can propose a flexible project management approach in the form of a formal proposal.

resources: Project Case Materials Across Diverse Industries
Collaboration Tools (Online Forums, Document Sharing Platforms)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
